text: Norne Securities AS is a Norwegian investment bank. The firm has total assets of over NOK 400 billion, 170 offices and 660,000 customers. ==History== * In 2008, Norne Securities was founded in Bergen, Norway by 15 independent Norwegian savings banks * In 2012, Norne Securities acquired Terra Markets from Norwegian savings bank, Eika Gruppen ==Ownership== Norne Securities is owned by 15 independent Norwegian savings banks {| class="wikitable sortable" |- ! Name !!
